title: Welcome to New Semester!
content: Get ready for an exciting semester ahead. Check your schedule and prepare your materials.
author: Admin

title: Midterm Exam Schedule
content: Midterm exams will be held from March 15-20. Please review the detailed schedule in the resources section.
author: Academic Office

title: Library Hours Extended
content: The library will now be open until 10 PM on weekdays to support your studies.
author: Library Department

title: Student Workshop: Study Skills
content: Join us for a workshop on effective study techniques this Friday at 3 PM in Room 201.
author: Student Services
